page.title: 18Housing,Marton & Birdingbury
page.content: We did a survey of houses in the villages of Marton and Birdingbury counting the number of houses in the following categories,semi_detached, terraced houses,mobile homes & bungalows.It was most noticeable in both villages that the majority of people owned and lived in detached properties valued between Â£45,000.and Â£100,000.There were only 6 thatched cottages remaining in Marton village; much of the thatch having been replaced by tiles in the last few years.The survey revealed there are roughly the same numbers of bungalows, semi-detached and terraced homes,but the price of properties in these villages make it very difficult for younger families to purchase their own homes.Many people had extended or improved their homes within the last five years.
